name: pras-claude-code
description: Pras's personal Claude Code setup with 22 productivity commands and 11 specialized AI agents for any development workflow (supports Supabase and Convex)
author: Pras

commands.name: task
commands.description: Universal task planner with AI-powered analysis (any language/framework)

commands.name: new-task
commands.description: Web development task planner for Next.js/React projects

commands.name: schema-gen
commands.description: Generate Convex schema definitions and TypeScript types

commands.name: function-new
commands.description: Create new Convex function (query, mutation, action)

commands.name: test-e2e
commands.description: Generate E2E tests using Playwright with browser automation

commands.name: test-component
commands.description: Generate component tests using Vitest and React Testing Library

commands.name: security-audit
commands.description: Perform security audit with dependency scanning and OWASP checks

agents.name: tech-stack-researcher
agents.description: Research and recommend technology choices for feature development

agents.name: backend-architect
agents.description: Design reliable backend systems with focus on data integrity, security, and fault tolerance

agents.name: deep-research-agent
agents.description: Specialist for comprehensive research with adaptive strategies and intelligent exploration

agents.name: frontend-architect
agents.description: Create accessible, performant user interfaces with focus on user experience and modern frameworks

agents.name: learning-guide
agents.description: Teach programming concepts and explain code with focus on understanding through progressive learning

agents.name: performance-engineer
agents.description: Optimize system performance through measurement-driven analysis and bottleneck elimination

agents.name: refactoring-expert
agents.description: Improve code quality and reduce technical debt through systematic refactoring and clean code principles

agents.name: requirements-analyst
agents.description: Transform ambiguous project ideas into concrete specifications through systematic requirements discovery

agents.name: security-engineer
agents.description: Identify security vulnerabilities and ensure compliance with security standards and best practices

agents.name: system-architect
agents.description: Design scalable system architecture with focus on maintainability and long-term technical decisions

agents.name: technical-writer
agents.description: Create clear, comprehensive technical documentation tailored to specific audiences with focus on usability

context7.description: Access up-to-date documentation for any library

sequential-thinking.description: Step-by-step reasoning for complex problem solving

playwright.description: Browser automation and web testing capabilities
